Package geometries

Class Quadrangle

java.lang.Object
geometries.Intersectable
geometries.Geometry
geometries.Quadrangle
public class Quadrangle extends Geometry
2D geometry representing a 4-sided shape this is a helper class in order to make the creation of scenes with four sided objects easier
